content: Take this bridge path up to find a massive statue altar at the far end. Standing next to a pillar nearby, you'll have your third meeting with the friendly Horse Guai. It seems he's quite bewitched by Yellowbrow and has lost the will to continue his quest.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
Take this bridge path up to find a massive statue altar at the far end. Standing next to a pillar nearby, you'll have your third meeting with the friendly Horse Guai. It seems he's quite bewitched by Yellowbrow and has lost the will to continue his quest.
